item.description:
We will most likely be in the room immediately to the left when you enter the building. Look for the Improv Incubator sign :)

Come out this week for another round of improv silliness and fun! We'll do some short form games and exciting exercises to cultivate energy in our minds and bodies.

We want everyone to have a great time and learn new things!

No experience necessary! Tons of experience welcomed!

Feel free to bring in any games you'd like to try!

$3 donation requested to cover room and website fees
item.how_to_find_us: room immediately to the left, look for the improv incubator sign and/or the short red head running around like a maniac
item.name: Improv It Out Now!
